name: tabctl
description: Control browser tabs from the keyboard
author: infokiller

tabctl-focus-left.description: Focus on the tab to the left

tabctl-focus-right.description: Focus on the tab to the right

tabctl-go-back.description: Navigate back in the active tab

tabctl-go-forward.description: Navigate forward in the active tab

tabctl-focus-last.description: Focus on the last focused tab
